Great for competitive people.I wanted the mention that the board is beautifully made. The rich contrasting varnishes on the wood make it stand out.

This is a see through lace curtain. It is very delicate and not very sturdy. The holes on top are stitch reinforced but they not that much. I don't expect much for the durability of this lace curtain.I do like it and the strong purple color makes for a great livening up of the bathroom. As I mentioned, this is see through, so you might want to use a solid color liner. I like when light goes through the curtain and reaches the shower, so I use a clear liner. My precious curtain was also slightly see through. This purple one is significantly more though.The sticking is not the best quality. At all. I examined all the edges and the ends and at times the stiching was downright sloppy. So, I deducted a star for that.I really like the product. It is delicate, likely too much, but it is very pretty and the colors are great.

I really like the SOFI Zipper Tote. First, it is very stylish. I love the look of it. It has a metallic brown color on the outside and a nice blue print on the inside. I love the contrastic colors and it adds to the space where you will be putting thisSecond, it is well made. The materials look sturdy and the construction shows good quality and thought behind it.It is a great tote. The zipper makes the removal of items easier instead of delving down into the tote.

My memento box was to capacity. So, I received this at the right time.This box is very deceiving. I was expecting semthing flimsy but it is actually rather sturdy. The box looks great and stylish. It is an off-white color. The only issue is that you better make sure your hands are very clean and the place in which you are going to set this is extremely clean. This attracts dirt a lotThe box is very convenient because it is collapsible and it folds together. But, the top does not fold at all.

I was skeptical of this product when I first received it. It is VERY lightweight and, honestly, just looked and felt a bit cheaply made. And it may have been, but it still works very well.This is a simple voice recorded that has a lot of extra features (you can transfer files into it). It has a decent microphone that picks up the recorded voice with decent clarity. I would use this for a meeting in a pinch if I had to. I have also used it for note taking whilst reading briefs and cases. The buttons are clearly marked and the main buttons (record, play and stop) are impossible to miss.You have to be near the microphone for it to properly record the voice. It won't work as well if not. So, if you are recording people that are far away (you are at the edge of a room whilst in a conference) than you should employ another recording device.This is a good recorded if you have clear and reasonable expectations. Do you want to be able to record meetings or your voice? Then this is a good, reasonably priced alternative. Do you want to record whilst in big conference rooms, get something else. The quality of the recording is just ok. Don't try to record people singing and expect to be able to have a good quality playback.Overrall, a great product.*Complimentary product provided for the purpose of a review.

This is my third hand saw. This is a great tool for trimming branches, for camping and/or survival. I like this handy saws as they are portable and super easy to use.After trying out this saw, I gave my old one away. It doesn't even compare in terms of ease of use and how fast it saws.What I like:1. It has convenient handles. The hand saw has convenient plastic handles that are red. They are easily visible and makes handling much better.2. This hand saw saws very quickly. Very. Seconds. It is very well made and is very sharp.3. It has a carrying ouch.This is a great hand saw for emergencies, the back yard or survival.*Complimentary product provided for the purpose of a review.

I really like the Kitchen Frontier brand. I have a few of their products and they have all worked very well. *Complimentary product was provided for purpose of a review.I make a lot of lemonade during the summer and it can get tiresome. So, unless you have an electric lemon squeezer, this is the next best thing. I have had a few of these lemon squeezers in a variety of materials. This steel one works very well. First, it is very well made and sturdy. After squeezing dozens of lemons over the last month, the lemon squeezer is not any worse off. I don't see any scratching of the material (as I have seen with the colorful lemon squeezers that look just like this one).The squeezer also has a very convenient hook to hang it somewhere.This is a very good product from a brand that I trust.*Complimentary product was provided for purpose of a review.

This is a really nice leather case/wallet for your phone. I have gotten a few compliments because the quality of the material shows. The wallet has a plastic case inside in which to fit your phone. It has 4 pockets for cards. No see through pocket for a license though. The closure is magnetic.It looks really nice and the stitching is well done and even.*Complimentary product was provided for purpose of a review.

This is a relatively inexpensive mouse that works just fine. The box describes it as an elegant and ergonomic design. It is not elegant at all. It has more of a rugged look and it is yellow. The ergonomics are ok, not too bad, but it is not long enough to provide adequate palm support. If that is an issue for you, you should look elsewhere.The pointer is really fast of the box and I had to adjust the settings.*Complimentary item provided for the purpose of a review.

I have been using the same clear plastic rings since 2005. I was ready for a change. I liked these rigns when I saw them. They provide a nice accent  and style to the curtain. They are easy to use and install and I was able to quickly hook it all up. The rings allow the curtain to hang about 1/2 inch more than the rings I previously had. I like this.The shower hooks have small roller beads on top that allow for the rings to slide easily through the rod without encountering much friction like the plastic would. It is a bit noisy but that's ok, it doesn't bother me.I really like these rings and I expect them to last quite a long time.UPDATE: 6/15/2015 - Well, I have been using these rings for about a month. It only took a couple of weeks for the rings to start ripping though my shower liner. These rings are very thin at the bottom. So much so that it acts like a cutting edge and it causes the shower liner to rip. By week 1 I could see tears forming in two places. By week 3, one of them had torn though. This is not something that has happened with other rings in my experience. Using these rings may lower the longevity of your shower liners if each hole is not lined with metal.

This is a sturdy water bottle that is convenient and spill-proof. This is for kids and non-kids as well! I have been using this water bottle for about a week now. I have largely stayed away from bottles with straws because it is just one other thing to clean and another place for dirt and germs to hide. If you need a straw, then this is a great water bottle. If you do not, then I would consider getting another of the many choices this brand carries.The designs on the bottles are great and make me feel upbeat and happy.
